issue.title: Restriction by number of features
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

The PROXY administrator should be able to determine the "MaxFeature" in a certain policy (for all or part of the FeatureType of a WFS service).

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Hi Xavier,

Is this very old issue still up to date or can we remove it?
I don't see use cases for such feature.

Thanks,

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

We can remove it.
